st: Jaane Meri Aankhon Se Kitne Aansu Bah Gaye,
s:
Jaane Meri Aankhon Se Kitne Aansu Bah Gaye,
Insaano Ki Bheed Mein Bhi Dekho Tanha Rah Gaye,

Karte The Jo Kabhi Apni Wafa Ki Baatein,
Aaj Wohi Sanam Mujhe Bewafa Kah Gaye….

st: Har Aag Bujh Jati Hai Barsat Mein,
s:
Har Aag Bujh Jati Hai Barsat Mein,
Magar Dil Ki Aag Na Bujh Saki,

Aansu Ka Paani Girta Raha,
Phir Bhi Dekho Yahan Jalti Rahi…..

st: Agar Yeh Jeevan Jal Bhi Jaye,
s:
Agar Yeh Jeevan Jal Bhi Jaye,
Too Aansu Na Bahana Toh Eh Dost,

Zeevan Chaahe Tadap Bhi Jaaye,
To Phir Bhi Naa Tu Pyar Jataana….

st: Tujhe Dekhe Bina Teri Tasweer Bana Sakta Hoon,
s:
Tujhe Dekhe Bina Teri Tasweer Bana Sakta Hoon,
Tujhse Mile Bina Tera Haal Bata Sakta Hoon,
Hai Meri Dosti Mein Itna Dum,
Apni Aankh Ka Aansu Teri Aankh Se Gira Sakta Hoon…

st: Teri Yaadon Ke Sahare Duniya Mein Rah Lete Hai,
s:
Teri Yaadon Ke Sahare Duniya Mein Rah Lete Hai,
Teri Juddai Ka Gam Chupchap Sah Lete Hai,
Samjhaya Dilko Yeh Raaz Chupana Hai,
Par Aansu Banke Wo Sab Kah Dete Hai…

st: Ehsaas Bohut Hoga Jab Chhod Ke Jayenge,
s:
Ehsaas Bohut Hoga Jab Chhod Ke Jayenge,
Royenge Bohut Magar Aansu Nahi Aayenge,

Jab Saath Na De Koi Toh Awaaz Humein Dena,
Aasmaan Per Bhi Honge Toh Laut Aayenge…

st: Nikalte Hai Aansoo Job Mulakat Nahi Hoti
s:
Nikalte Hai Aansoo Job Mulakat Nahi Hoti
Toot Jata Hai Dil Jab Bai Nahi Hoti
Teri Jaan Ki Kasam A Dost
Jab Tu Yad Na Aye
Aisi Koi Shaam Nahi Hoti…

st: Halat Hi Aisi Hai Ke Aansu Chhalak Aate Hain,
s:
Halat Hi Aisi Hai Ke Aansu Chhalak Aate Hain,
De Kar Ke Muhko Gham, Sabhi Dil Ko Dukhate Hain,

Main Aaj Talak Na Samajh Paya Hun Mere Khuda,
Mere Kiye Ehsaano Ko Sab Kyu Bhool Jaate Hain…

st: Musafir Hoon Yahan Se Kal Chala Jaunga Main,
s:
Musafir Hoon Yahan Se Kal Chala Jaunga Main,
Jaane Kis Kis Rahguzar Ki Thokren Khaunga Main,

Chalte Chalte Thak Gaya Hoon Khoob Sone Do Mujhe,
Aansuon Se Zindaghi Ke Daagh Dhone Do Mujhe,

Aish O Isharat Apna Khota Hoon Toh Khone Do Mujhe,
Zindaghi Ki Khoj Mein Paagal Hone Do Mujhe,

Kyunki,
Musafir Hoon Yahan Se Kal Chal Jaunga Main…

st: Hum Markar Bhi Dikha Denge Unke Liye,
s:
Hum Markar Bhi Dikha Denge Unke Liye,
Kya Woh Fir Bhi Na Humko Chahenge,

Jab Jalaya Jaayega Sagar Unke Saamne,
Kya Hamare Liye Do Aansu Bhi Na Bahayenge…

st: Main Tumko Bhool Bhi Sakta Hun Is Jahan Ke Liye,
s:
Main Tumko Bhool Bhi Sakta Hun Is Jahan Ke Liye,
Jara Sa Jhoot Jaruri Hai Daataa Ke Liye,

Mere Labon Par Koi Boond Tapki Aansu Ki,
Yeh Katra Kafi Tha Jalte Huye Makaan Ke Liye,

Main Kya Dikhaun Mere Taar Taar Daman Mein,
Na Kuchh Yahan Ke Liye Na Kuchh Vahan Ke Liye,

Gajal Bhi Is Tarah Uske Saamne Laya Hun,
Ki Jaise Bachha Koi Aaye Imtehaan Ke Liye…

st: Ruye Hian Sabhi Toh Aakar Lash Par Hamari,
s:
Ruye Hian Sabhi Toh Aakar Lash Par Hamari,
Magar Unhone Do Aansu Bhi Na Bahaaye Hain,

Hamein Kiya Barbad Loota Hai Jis Jaalim Ne,
Door Khade Hokar Dekho Woh Muskaraye Hain…

st: Jab Se Is Dil Ko Lagaya Hai,
s:
Jab Se Is Dil Ko Lagaya Hai,
So Bhi Toh Hum Nahi Paate Hain,

Hansana Toh Kab Ka Bhool Chuke Hain,
Aansu Bhi Toh Ab Nahi Aate Hain…

st: mohabbat se, inayat se, wafa se, chot lagti hai
s:
mohabbat se, inayat se, wafa se, chot lagti hai
bikhrata phool hun mujhko hawa se chot lagti hai,

meri aankho mein aansu ki tarah ek raat aa jao
taklluf se banavat se ada se chot lagti hai,

main sabnam ki jubaa se sabnam ki aawaj sunta hu
ajab ahsas hai apna sada se chot lagti hai

tujhe khud apni majboori ka andaja nahin shayad
na kar ahad e wafa, ahad e wafa se chot lagti hai…

st: sher mere kahan the kisi ke liye
s:
sher mere kahan the kisi ke liye
maine sab kuchh likha hai tumhare liye

apne dukh sukh bahut khubsurat rahe
hum jiyen bhi to ke dusre ke liye

hum safar ne mera saath chhoda nahin
apne aansu diye raaste ke liye

is haweli mein ab koi rahta nahi
chand nikla kise dekhne ke liye

st: Mera Us Se Wada Tha Ghar Rahne Ka,
s:
Mera Us Se Wada Tha Ghar Rahne Ka,
Apni Chhat Ke Niche Sukh Dukh Sahne Ka,

Baaris Baaris Kachhi Kabr Ka Dhulna Hai,
Jaan Leva Ehsaas Akela Rahne Ka,

Ab Ke Aansu Aankhon Se Dil Mein Utre,
Rukh Badla Dariya Ne Kaisa Bahne Ka,

Jagmag Jagmag Hire Jaisi Aankho Mein,
Ek Ajib Gubar Haweli Dahne Ka…

st: Sham Ke Ped Ki Surmayi Shakh Par,
s:
Sham Ke Ped Ki Surmayi Shakh Par,
Pattiyon Mein Chhupa Koi Jugnu Bhi Hai,

Saahilon Par Padi Sippiyon Mein Kahin,
Jhilmilata Hua Ek Aansu Bhi Hai,

Aandhiyan Raakh Ke Dher Leti Gayi,
Chamki Chingariyan Compalon Ki Tarah,

In Dino Zindagi Fir Hamare Liye,
Subah Pyari Bhi Hai Shaam Gesu Bhi Hai….

st: Nange Paanv Fariston Ka Ek Tola,
s:
Nange Paanv Fariston Ka Ek Tola,
Aasmaa Se Jamee Par Utarne Laga,

Nange Sar Falak Jadiyan Ars Se,
Aansuon Ke Sitare Girati Rahi,

Ek Khidki Mein Do Aansuon Ka Safar,
Raat Ke Raaston Ki Tarah Kho Gaya,

Narm Mitti Par Girti Huyi Pattiyan,
Sone Waalon Ko Chadrein Udhati Rahin…

st: Barf Si Ujali Pousak Pahne Huye,
s:
Barf Si Ujali Pousak Pahne Huye,
Ped Jaise Duaon Mein Vayast Hai,

Vaadiyan Paak Mariyam Ka Aanchal Huyi,
Aao Sajda Karein Sar Jhukayein Kahin,

Koi Pathar Ki Lakir Nahin Hain Hum,
Jispe Likhe Huye Sabd Badlate Nahin,

Hum Toh Aansu Hain Palko Par Rakh Lo,
Hamein Jab Ishara Karo Toot Jaayein Kahin…

st: Aadami Hona Hansi Majak Nahin,
s:
Aadami Hona Hansi Majak Nahin,
Aur Kuchh Is Se Dardnaak Nahin,

Roj Pina Hai Khoon Ke Aansu,
Hai Dikhana Ke Jigar Chaak Nahin,

Ab Nahin Zindagi Se Riste Hain,
Par Abhi Tak Hua Talak Nahin,

Savh Toh Kahna Tha Magar Narmi Se,
Is Kadar Hona Tha Bebak Nahi,

Arse Se Chaha Tha Fanna Hona,
Abhi Talak Toh Hua Khak Nahin…

st: Hava Ne Khola Pitara Khusbuon Ka,
s:
Hava Ne Khola Pitara Khusbuon Ka,
Udd Chala Jaadu Mahkate Geshuon Ka,

Besabab Kuchh Bhi Nahin Hota Yahan Par,
Koi Matlab Hai Machlate Jaaduon Ka,

Chand Ko Soorat Pe Apni Naaj Hai Bhi,
Kya Gunaah Bhala Bahkate Majnuon Ka,

Chup Karao Virah Ke Maare Huon Ka,
Asar Hi Dekha Kahan Gham Aansuon Ka,

Farj Kal Ke Aaj Nibtana Hi Behtar,
Dhire Dhire Ghatega Bal Baajuon Ka…

st: Woh Sochti Hai Ki Pyar Mein,
s:
Woh Sochti Hai Ki Pyar Mein,
Shirf Wohi Udas Hai Yaaro,

Kaise Batayen Use Ki,
Hum Kayi Raaton Se Theek Se Soye Nahin,

Or Kitni Baar Humne,
Unki Yaad Mein Aansu Bahaye Hain,

Kya Karein Kambakhat,
Aansu Rahte Nahin Gir Ke Sukh Jaate Hain,

Varna Hum Unhe Apne Aansu,
Dikha Ke Apni Mohabbat Ke Bade Sabut Dete…

st: Mit Gaya Darde Mohabbat Ka Maja,
s:
Mit Gaya Darde Mohabbat Ka Maja,
Savarg Mein Aaram Hi Aaram Hai,

Kar Liya Boo Se Apna Dil Asir,
In Gulandamo Ka Achha Daam Hai,

Dil Khun Se Tar Aankh Mein Aansu Nahin,
Sisha Hain Labrej Khali Jaam Hai,

Woh Jalata Bhi Hai Khud Jalta Bhi Hai,
Jaante Ho Daag Kiska Naam Hai….

st: Na Kisi Shaks Ki Ijjat Na Kisi Ka Aadar,
s:
Na Kisi Shaks Ki Ijjat Na Kisi Ka Aadar,
Aasik Aate Hain Ki Tumhaare Gulam Aate Hain,

Rasm E Tabdir Bhi Mit Jaaye Yahi Matlab Hai,
Unke Khat Mein Mujhe Gairo Ke Salaam Aate Hain,

Aansu Ho, Nala Ho, Hasrat Ho, Ki Armaan E Vishal,
Aane Wale Teri Furkat Mein Madam Aate Hain,

Daag Ki Tarah Se Gull Hote Hain Sadke Kurbaan,
Bahr E Gulgast Chaman Mein Jonijam Aate Hain…

st: Kya Karogi Tum Khat Likhkar,
s:
Kya Karogi Tum Khat Likhkar,
Aanchal Hawa Mein Uda Dena,

Apne Ghesu Ki Udhti Khusbu Se,
Tum Dil Ka Paigam Bhijwa Dena,

Is Kaadr Gir Gaye,
Humko Bhi Gira Diya Jamane Ne,

Kyu Likhte Ho Asko Se Khat,
Ab Kya Rakha Hai Aansu Bahane Mein…

st: Jakham Kuchh Aise The Dil Par,
s:
Jakham Kuchh Aise The Dil Par,
Jo Sareaam Sabko Dikhaye Na Gaye,

Hamari Ki Gayi Wafa Ke Badle,
Us Bewafa Se Kabhi Chukaye Na Gaye,

st: Jab Se Bichhda Hai Sanam Hamara,
s:
Jab Se Bichhda Hai Sanam Hamara,
Dil Nahin Karta Ab Jine Ko,

Saath Lekar Chala Gaya Khusiyan,
Bas De Gaya Hamein Aansu Pine Ko…

st: Jab Bhi Pyas Lagti Hai Hamein,
s:
Jab Bhi Pyas Lagti Hai Hamein,
Toh Apne Aansu Hi Pi Lete Hain,

Mar Jaate Hum Toh Jane Kab Se,
Teri Yaadon Ke Sahare Ji Lete Hain,

Teri Yaadon Ne Jab Jab Mujhko Sataya Hai,
Sitam Maine Apne Hi Jism Pe Dhaya Hai,

Hakikat Yeh Thi Bana Woh Hi Mout Ka Karan,
Jise Samjha Khuda Ne Mere Liye Banaya Hai…

st: Dar Dar Se Thokar Khane Ke Baad,
s:
Dar Dar Se Thokar Khane Ke Baad,
Hum Lahu Di Ka Bahate Rahe,

Tum Fir Bhi Na Khush Huye Dost,
Hum Har Rista Thukraate Rahe,

Jisne Hamein Apnana Chaha,
Har Chahat Ko Hum Thukrate Rahe,

Vaqt Aaya Aur Chala Gaya,
Hum Kismat Pe Aansu Bahate Rahe…

st: Jamane Ki Najro Mein Kabhi Mujrim Na Ban Jaana,
s:
Jamane Ki Najro Mein Kabhi Mujrim Na Ban Jaana,
Khabar Rakho Jamane Ki Raho Tum Bekhabar Hokar,

Hamein Duniya Ke Jhamelo Ka Koi Ahsas Nahin,
Ek Kone Mein Alag Sabse Juda Baithe Hain,

Mubarak Hai Jo Dil Mein Doosro Ka Dard Rakhte Hain,
Aansu Aankh Mein Aur Lab Pe Aahen Sard Rakhte Hain…

st: Dupatta Bhi Seene Se Tere Aise Chipak Jata Hai,
s:
Dupatta Bhi Seene Se Tere Aise Chipak Jata Hai,
Fir Jeete Huye Insaan Ki Kya Haalat Hogi Sanam,

Tumhe Paane Ke Liye Kya Kya Nahin Kiya Maine,
Kitne Din Raat Teri Gali Mein Gujaar Diye Maine,

Thokar Toh Khayi Humne Unko Na Pahchane,
Woh Bewafa Nikle Jo Ho Gaye Begane,

Jab Yaad Tumhaari Aati Hai Toh Dil Tham Leta Hu,
Aansu Tapak Padte Hain Jab Tumhara Naam Leta Hu…..

st: Ask Dekar Aankoho Mein Jaalim,
s:
Ask Dekar Aankoho Mein Jaalim,
Khade Ho Woh Kahkahe Lagane Lage Hain,

Woh Hans Kar Dete Hain Aanchal Ka Tukda,
Jab Hum Kismet Pe Aansu Bahaane Lage Hain,

Ask Mohabbat Mein Jo Hamne Paaye,
Keemat Aansuo Ki Jab Woh Lagane Lage Hain,

Hamne Maangi Thi Unse Mohabbat,
Woh Bewafai Ka Ilzaam Lagane Lage Hain…

st: Har Ek Jajbaat Ko Zubaan Nahin Milati,
s:
Har Ek Jajbaat Ko Zubaan Nahin Milati,
Har Ek Aarju Ko Dua Nahi Milati,

Mohabbatt Banaye Rakho,
To Duniya Hai Saat Tumhaare,

Varna Aansuon Ko To Aankho,
Mein Bhi Jagah Nahin Milati…

st: Teri Dosti Ne Mujhe,
s:
Teri Dosti Ne Mujhe,
Dard Sahna Sikha Diya,

Marti Huyi Rooh Ko Jeena Sikha Diya,
Kya Kahun Kya Hai Tera Saath Mere Liye,

Tere Saath Ne,
Mere Aansuo Ko Muskurana Sikha Diya…

st: Aansu Jo Bah Rahe Hain Inhe Bahne Do,
s:
Aansu Jo Bah Rahe Hain Inhe Bahne Do,
Yeh Kah Rahe Hain Dil Ki Baat Kahne Do,

Bahut Bewafa Ho Tum ,Yeh Hunko Hai Malum,
Tum Wafa Ki Baat Apne Tak Hi Rahne Do,

Mila Toh Kya Mila Tumhe Chahne Ke Baad,
Bas Dukh Hi Sah Rahe Hain Hamein Sahne Do,

Tumne Toh Kah Dala Haal-E-Dil Apna,
Ab Mujhko Bhi Apna Haal-E-Dil Kahne Do…

st: Dekh Kar Tanha,
s:
Dekh Kar Tanha,
Mujhse Pucha Bahaaron Ne,

Kaha Gaya Tera Woh Hamsafar,
Tujhe To Bada Naaz Tha Uspar,

Yeh Dekh Kar Main Chup Rahaa,

Par Mere Aansuon Ne Jawab Diya,
Milna Kismat, Bichhadna Naseeb Tha,

Woh Mujhse Itna Door Ho Gaya,
Jitna Woh Mere Kareeb Tha…

st: Palko Mein Aansu Aur,
s:
Palko Mein Aansu Aur,
Dil Mein Dard Soya Hai,

Hasne Walon Ko Kya Pata,
Rone Wala Kis Kadar Roya Hai,

Yeh To Bas Wohi Jan Sakta Hai,

Jisne Zindagi Mein Kisi Ko,
Pane Se Pahle Khoya Hai…

st: Chhuri Dil Pe Chalne Lagi Hai,
s:
Chhuri Dil Pe Chalne Lagi Hai,
Jab Hum Naam Unka Batane Lage Hain,

Qatal Kiya Hai Unhone Hamara,
Ab Hamein Hi Woh Qaatil Batane Lage Hain,

Qatal Kar Ke Bhi Sukun Na Aaya Unhe,
Daag Bewafai Ka Daaman Pe Lagane Lage Hain,

Daag Aansu Se Dhoya Jab Hamne,
Who Keemat Aansuo Ki Chukane Lage Hain…

st: Pani Na Ho To Nadiyan Kis Kam Ki
s:
Pani Na Ho To Nadiyan Kis Kam Ki
Aansu Na Ho To Aankhen Kis Kam Ki
Dil Na Ho To Dhadkan Kis Kam Ki
Agar Main Apko Yaad Na Karun To
Hamari Yeh Dosti Kis Kam Ki…

st: Wo Saagar Nahi Aansu The Mere,
s:
Wo Saagar Nahi Aansu The Mere,
Jis Par Wo Kashti Chalaate Rahe,
Manzil Mile Unhe Yeh Aarzu Thi Meri,
Is Liye Hum Aansu Bahaate Rahe…

st: Aansu Baha K Apna Daaman Jo Main Nichodon,
s:
Aansu Baha K Apna Daaman Jo Main Nichodon,
Mehandi Mila K Apne Hathon Mein Tum Lagana,
Doli Mein Tum Utho Jab To Aaye Khayaal Mera,
Aai Hai Mout Mujhko Tum Aisa Khayal Kerna…

st: Aansuon Ko Bahut Samjhaya,
s:
Aansuon Ko Bahut Samjhaya,
Ki Tanhai Mein Aaya Karo,
Is Tarah Mahfil Mein,
Hamara Majak Mat Udaya Karo,
Is Par Aansu Tadap Kar Kahte Hain,
Itne Logon Mein,
Aapko Tanha Paate Hain,
Isiliye Chale Aate Hain…

st: Saath Deta Jo Samay Aap Hamare Hote,
s:
Saath Deta Jo Samay Aap Hamare Hote,
Hum Bhi Doosro Ki Tarah Aapke Pyare Hote,
Ye  Mere Aansu Jinhe Ponchhne Vala Bhi Nahi Koi,
Aanchal Inhe Milta To Sitare Hote …

st: Kismet ruk gai dil ke taar toot gaye,
s:
Kismet ruk gai dil ke taar toot gaye,
Wo bhi rudh gaye sapne bhi toot gaye,

Khajane mein sirf do aansu,
Jab yaad aayi aapki tho wo bhi lut gaye…

st: Bhar aayi meri aankhein jab uska naam aaya,
s:
Bhar aayi meri aankhein jab uska naam aaya,
Ishq naakam sahi fir bhi bahut kaam aaya,
Humne mohabbat mein aisi bhi guzaari raate,
Jab tak aansu na bahe dil ko na aaraam aaya…

st: Bnane wale ne kash mujhe aansu banaya hota,
s:
Bnane wale ne kash mujhe aansu banaya hota,
Aur unki aankho me basaya hota,
Jab girte unka ankho se unki god me,
Mujhe bhi marne ka maza aaya hota…

st: Woh Toh Paani Ki Boond Hai Jo Ankho Se Beh Jaye,
s:
Woh Toh Paani Ki Boond Hai Jo Ankho Se Beh Jaye,
Aansu Toh Woh Hai Jo Tadap K Ankho Me Hi Reh Jaye,
Woh Pyar Kya Jo Lafzo Me Bayan Ho?
Pyar Toh Woh Hai Jo Aakhon Me Nazar Aaye…

st: Aankho Ki Thi Khata, Saza Dil Ne Payi Hai,
s:
Aankho Ki Thi Khata, Saza Dil Ne Payi Hai,
Pyar Mein Hume Mili Yaar Se Sirf Ruswayi Hai,
Tanhaiyo Ka Hai Daur Aur Dard Se Aankh Bhar Aayi Hai,
Lamho Ki Thi Khata, Sadiyo Ki Saza Payi Hai…

st: Aansuo Ko Kaha Hai Tanhai Me Aya Karein,
s:
Aansuo Ko Kaha Hai Tanhai Me Aya Karein,
Bhari Mehfil Me Humara Majak Na Udaya Karein,
Is Par Aansu Has Kar Bole,
Bhari Mehfil Me Tumhe Tanha Pate Hai Isiliye Chale Ate Hai…

st: Kaha Tha Tumne Ke Pyar Ka Wada Kabhi Na Todna,
s:
Kaha Tha Tumne Ke Pyar Ka Wada Kabhi Na Todna,
Kaha Tha Humne Ke Tanha Hume Kabhi Na Chhodna,
Kyou Ki Aansuo Ko Hum Pee Na Payenge,
Tumsa Juda Hoka Hum Jee Na Payenge…

st: Kyu Chale Ja Rhe Ho Mujhse Munh Mod Kar
s:
Kyu Chale Ja Rhe Ho Mujhse Munh Mod Kar
Pyar Ki Yaado Mein Bhatkane Ko Akela Chhod Kar
Aansu Nahi Thamte Hain Harjeet Teri Yaado Me
Chandni Bhi Jalati Hai Gam Ki Raaton Me
Apne Pyar Ko Na Yu Ruswa Krunga
Jaan Kaha Hai Harjeet Tujhe Na Kuch Aur Khunga
Keh De Ke Khush Ho Door Ho Kar Mujhse
Teri Khushi Ke Liye Ye Dunia Bhi Chhod Dunga…

st: Zindagi Hai Khoobsurat Par Mohabbat Hai Uski Zaroorat
s:
Zindagi Hai Khoobsurat Par Mohabbat Hai Uski Zaroorat
Har Ek Saks Ki Nigahon Mei Basti Hai Kisi Dilbar Ki Surat
Chalakte Hain Aankhon Se Aansu Yaadon Mei Kisi Ki
Ban Jaate Hain Wo Bhi Bejaan Koi Murat…

st: Adhuri Meri Bhi Kahani Rah Jayegi
s:
Adhuri Meri Bhi Kahani Rah Jayegi
Adhuri Teri Bhi Zindagani Reh Jayegi
Baithoge Jab Bhi Fursat K Palo Me Yaad Kroge Muzhe Hi
Aankho Se Behne Wale Aansu ‘Kumar’ Teri Nishani Rah Jayegi…

st: Pyar Ke Liye Rishto Ki Jarurat Na Hoti
s:
Pyar Ke Liye Rishto Ki Jarurat Na Hoti
Baat Ke Liye Sabdo Ki Jarurat Na Hoti
Dil Ki Baate Jo Aap Samajh Jaate
Ankho Ko Aansuo Ki Jarurat Na Hoti…

st: Kalam Chalti Hai To Dil Ki Awaz Likhta Hoon
s:
Kalam Chalti Hai To Dil Ki Awaz Likhta Hoon
Gham Aur Judai Ke Andaz-E-Bayaan Likhta Hoon
Rukte Nahi Hain Meri Aankhon Se Aansu
Main Jab Bhi Uski Yaad Mein Alfaz Likhta Hoon…

st: Yaaro Mere Marne Ke Baad,
s:
Yaaro Mere Marne Ke Baad,
Aansu Mat Bahana…
Yaaro… Mere Marne Ke Bad,
Aansoo Mat Bahana…

st: Koi Rasta Nahi Dua Ke Siva
s:
Koi Rasta Nahi Dua Ke Siva
Koi Sunta Bhi Nahi Khuda Ke Siva
Maine Zindagi Koi Kareeb Se Dekha Hai Dost
Muskil Mein Koi Sath Nahi Deta Aansu Ke Siva

st: Wo Aansu Jo Palko Ki Zeenat Nahi Bante
s:
Wo Aansu Jo Palko Ki Zeenat Nahi Bante
Wo Chupke Se Dil Mein Utar Jaya Karte Hain
Kuch Log Apne Dukho Ki Numaish Nahi Karte
Bas Khamoshi Se Hi Bikhar Jaya Karte Hain…

st: Jane Kyun Aansuo Se Aankh Bhar Aayi
s:
Jane Kyun Aansuo Se Aankh Bhar Aayi
Dil Ko Shayad Tumhari Yaad Bahut Aayi
Chahat Thi Itni Tum Se Milne Ki
Lekin Ye Baat Uperwale Ko Kabhi Raas Na Aayi…

st: Hum Rooth Jayenge To Manaane Ka Wada Kiya Tha
s:
Hum Rooth Jayenge To Manaane Ka Wada Kiya Tha
Hum Door Jayenge To Bulaane Ka Wada Kiya Tha
Aaj Palkon Pe Aansu Bhar Diye Jisne
Zindagi Bhar Hasaane Ka Wada Kiya Tha…

st: Apni Aankho Mein Lakhon Sawal Rakhta Hoon
s:
Apni Aankho Mein Lakhon Sawal Rakhta Hoon
Magar Main Gareeb Apna Tuta Dil Sambhal Rakhta Hoon
Bahut Purana Talluq Hai Mera Aansuon Se
Hamesha Jeb Mein Bhiga Rumal Rakhta Hoon

st: Karoge Yaad Ek Din Is Pyar Ke Zamane Ko
s:
Karoge Yaad Ek Din Is Pyar Ke Zamane Ko
Chale Jayenge Jab Hum Kabhi Na Vapas Aane Ko
Chalega Mehfil Mein Jab Zikr Hamara Koi
To Tum Bhi Tanhai Dhundoge Aansu Bahane Ko

st: Dilon Mein Aarzu Ke Diye Jalte Rahenge
s:
Dilon Mein Aarzu Ke Diye Jalte Rahenge
Aankhon Se Aansu Nikalte Rahenge
Aap Shama Bankar Dil Mein Roshni Karna
Hum Mom Bankar Pighalte Rahenge

st: In Aansuo Ki Keemat Kahan Koi Samjh Paya Hai
s:
In Aansuo Ki Keemat Kahan Koi Samjh Paya Hai
Hamne To Ro Rokar Bhi Bs Jamane Ko Hansaya Hai
Hamne To Ro Rokar Bhi Bs Jamane Ko Hansaya Hai…

st: Shayad Mere Aansu Se Uska Koi Rishta Hai
s:
Shayad Mere Aansu Se Uska Koi Rishta Hai
Tapte Sehra Mein Jo Phool Akela Hai

Ho Sakta Hai Kal Suraj Sota Hi Mujhe Paye
Ik Saanp Mere Mere Dil Mein Simta Hua Baitha Hai

Ab Roye Kahan Savan, Ab Tadpe Kahan Baadal
Yoon Mehendi Wale Hath Per Aansu Abhi Tapka Hai

st: Tera Hath Mere Kandhe Per, Dariya Behta Jata Hai
s:
Tera Hath Mere Kandhe Per, Dariya Behta Jata Hai
Kitni Khamoshi Se Dukh Ka Mausam Guzar Jata Hai

Raakh Hui In Aankhon Ki Shamein, Aansu Bhi Benoor Hue
Dheerey-Dheerey- Mera Dil Pathar Sa Hota Jata Hai

Apna Dil Hai Ek Parinda Jiske Bazoo Tute Hain
Hasrat Se Baadal Ko Dekhe, Kaise Baadal Udta Jata Hai

Humne To Bazar Mein Duniya Bechi Aur Kharidi Hai
Humko Kya Maloom Kisi Ko Kaise Chaha Jata Hai

st: Main Kab Tanha Hua Tha, Yaad Hoga
s:
Main Kab Tanha Hua Tha, Yaad Hoga
Tumhara Faisla Tha, Yaad Hoga

Bahut Se Ujle-Ujle Phool Lekar
Koi Tumse Mila Tha, Yaad Hoga

Bichi Thi Har Taraf Aankhein Hi Aankhein
Koi Aansu Gira Tha, Yaad Hoga

Udasi Aur Badhti Ja Rahi Thi
Voh Chehra Bujh Raha Tha, Yaad Hoga

st: Rishton Ki Duniya Mein
s:
Rishton Ki Duniya Mein
Sabse Pyari Hai Dosti Tumhari
Manzoor Hai Aansu Bhi Akhon Mein Humari
Agar Aa Jaye Muskan Chehre Pe Tumhari

st: Pyase Ko Ek Katra Pani Kafi Hai
s:
Pyase Ko Ek Katra Pani Kafi Hai
Ishq Mein Char Pal Ki Zindgani Kafi Hai
Doobne Ko Samander Mein Jayein Kahan
Aapki Aankh Se Tapka Voh Pani Kafi Hai
